saukhya amathyanshaya sathu wahana 575 k athurudan wi athi bawa danwamin ema amathyanshaye lekamwariya polispathiwarayata lipiyak yomukara thibenawa.me athara saukhya amathyanshaye wahana sanchithaya pilibadawa wiganakadhipathiwaraya sidukarana lada wishesha wigananayakin helidarawwi aththe ema amathyanshaye wahana 1794 k asthana gathawi athi bawayi.saukhya amathyanye wahana 575 k k soyaganimata nohakiwi athi bawa danwamin saukhya amathyanshaye lekam wasantha perera mahathmiya polispathiwaraya wetha yawa athi lipiya sambandhayen polis mulasthanaya parikshanayak aarambha kara thibenawa.ee anuwa athurudan bawata paminili kara athi wahanawala anka samagin niyojya polispathi el.eech.ee.dabliw.ke.silwa mahathage athsanin aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa athulu kottasha rasakata danwa aththe adala wahana pilibadawa soyabala elambaena 10 wanadata pera wartha karana lesayi.me athara saukhya amathyanshaye wahana kalamanakaranaya pilibadawa wishesha wiganana warthawak elidakmin wiganakadhipathiwaraya sadahan kara aththe ema amathyanshaye wahana 1794 k asthanagathawi athi bawayi.ebawin adala wahana soya ganima sadaha aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa wetha pawarana lesada wiganakadhipathiwaraya mema warthawen nirdesha kara thibenawa.emenma mema warthawen penwadi aththe siee/1/17/1 darana chakralekhayata anuwa saukhya amathyawarayata bhawitha kirimata himikam aththe amathyanshaya sathu wahana thunak pamanak wuwada ohu wahana 18 k bhawitha kara athi bawayi.thawada saukhya niyojya amathyawaraya da amathyanshayen himikam labana wahana 3 ta amatharawa thawath wahana 8 k bhawitha kara athi bawada wiganana warthawe sadahan.

ema ilakka kothek durata 2011 di athpath karagena thiyanawada? 2005 mahinda chinthana wadapiliwela idiripath wuna 2010 mahinda chinthana idiri dakma idiripath wuna.dan me wadapiliwelawala jayagrahana ee aramunu walata kothek durata langa wela thiyanawada me karunu karana sambandhayen honda pasu wiparamak maha banku warthawa haraha apata labaganna puluwan.maha banku wartha thula thiyena karana desa baluwahama apata penawa pradhana washayen ithihasaye mulwarata nidahasin pasu kala simawa thula eka digata awurudu dekak aarthika wruddhiya siyayata 8 kata wada ihala agayak ganne 2010 ha 2011 wasarawalayi.1978 sita rate aarthika sanwardhana wegaya aththatama siyata 4 - 5 athara parasayaka thamayi wihidune. 2001 di rate aarthika sanwardhanaya runa agayak gaththa.me siyalla atha arala 2005 indala gaththoth apata penawa 2009 wasara hara anith sama wasarakama aarthika wardhana wegaya siyata 6 simawe samanya agayaka randila thiyenawa.
